title: You know the March Mystery Skin that you could buy for yourself?

replies.body: it would be crazy if they kept self mystery gift permanently. especially if you own most of the skins, youll just be able to get all the good/new skins much more frequently and for cheap!

I actually don't know why they don't keep it on permanently. 

I almost guarantee that they would make more money for keeping it on. And it doesn't really harm anyone.

I know they have said that one of the reasons is that they don't want everyone to spend all their money on mystery skins. But that makes no sense.

_shrugs_

Well if you could gift them to yourself constantly they actually would be losing more money due to the fact they are 490RP when they range from 520-3250.. and well a lot of people would chose to do that hoping they'd get something good over paying the normal price for it.  Mystery Gifting is alright to be left on cause it's not like people do that all the time for each other.
People do make smurfs and just gift it to their other accounts. Even more so since they just lowered the restrictions
